description:
Season: 18
Original Air Date: 8/22/2005

As Dante watches Nick and Bridget, Taylor calls him regarding Bridget’s pregnancy. Dante reveals that Bridget already terminated the pregnancy, to Taylor’s shock.  Although Bridget states that she didn’t mean to hurt Nick, he is extremely upset and refuses to believe that Bridget has terminated the pregnancy.  Brooke is shocked to find Stephanie pointing a gun at her. Brooke picks up the gun as if she’s going to shoot herself, but she turns the gun on Stephanie instead. Stephanie taunts Brooke to shoot her and when Brooke fires the gun at Stephanie, she misses.
